title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 374-1.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 374-1.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) Applicability. This Subpart contains requirements for generators and
transporters of the hazardous wastes identified in section
371.1
(g)(1)(ii)
of
this Title and for owners and operators of facilities managing the hazardous
wastes identified in section
373-1.1
(d)(1)(vii) and
(viii)
of this Title that are required to
comply with this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
374-1.1

Amended

New

York State Register March 4, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 09, eff. 4/18/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
